mapper.sql: ORG_REL_ID, ORG_ID, PARENT_ORG_ID, REF_CODE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT B.ORG_NAME NAME, B.ORG_ID ID ,A.PARENT_ORG_ID PID FROM TB_ORG_REL A, TB_ORG B, TB_ORG_REL_TYPE C, TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF D, TB_ORG_TREE E WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND D.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = D.ORG_TREE_ID AND C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = D.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND A.REF_CODE = C.REF_CODE AND A.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = #{orgTreeId} AND A.ORG_ID = #{orgRootId}

SELECT B.ORG_NAME NAME, B.ORG_ID ID ,A.PARENT_ORG_ID PID FROM TB_ORG_REL A, TB_ORG B, TB_ORG_REL_TYPE C, TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF D, TB_ORG_TREE E WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND D.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = D.ORG_TREE_ID AND C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = D.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND A.REF_CODE = C.REF_CODE AND A.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = #{orgTreeId}
AND A.PARENT_ORG_ID = #{pid}

SELECT count(1) FROM TB_ORG_REL A, TB_ORG B, TB_ORG_REL_TYPE C, TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF D, TB_ORG_TREE E WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND D.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = D.ORG_TREE_ID AND C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = D.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND A.REF_CODE = C.REF_CODE AND A.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = #{orgTreeId}
AND A.PARENT_ORG_ID = #{pid}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ORG_NAME, '->'), '->', '//'),'//', '/') fullName, ORG_NAME orgName,LEVEL lv,ORG_ID orgId FROM (SELECT A.ORG_ID, A.ORG_NAME, A.FULL_NAME, B.PARENT_ORG_ID FROM TB_ORG A, TB_ORG_REL B WHERE A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID AND A.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.STATUS_CD = 1000) AA START WITH ORG_ID = ${orgRootId} CONNECT BY PRIOR AA.ORG_ID = AA.PARENT_ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1
AND FULLNAME like '%'||#{search}||'%'

SELECT E.ORG_NAME orgName ,E.ORG_ID orgId,D.PARENT_ORG_ID parentOrgId,E.ORG_CODE orgCode FROM TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF A, TB_ORG_TREE B, TB_ORG_REL_TYPE C,TB_ORG_REL D,TB_ORG E WHERE A.ORG_TREE_ID = B.ORG_TREE_ID AND A.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND D.ORG_ID=E.ORG_ID AND C.REF_CODE=D.REF_CODE AND A.ORG_TREE_ID = #{orgVo.orgTreeId}
AND E.ORG_NAME like '%'||#{orgVo.search}||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ORG_ID id,PARENT_ORG_ID pid,ORG_NAME name FROM ( SELECT E.ORG_NAME,E.ORG_ID ,D.PARENT_ORG_ID,D.CREATE_DATE,E.ORG_CODE FROM TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF A, TB_ORG_TREE B, TB_ORG_REL_TYPE C,TB_ORG_REL D,TB_ORG E WHERE A.ORG_TREE_ID = B.ORG_TREE_ID AND A.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND D.ORG_ID=E.ORG_ID AND C.REF_CODE=D.REF_CODE AND A.ORG_TREE_ID =#{orgTreeId} )AA START WITH ORG_ID = #{orgId} CONNECT BY AA.ORG_ID = PRIOR AA.PARENT_ORG_ID )

SELECT * FROM ( WITH FUZZYORGTREE AS( SELECT * FROM (SELECT ORG_ID ORGID,SUP_ORG_ID supOrgId FROM (SELECT A.ORG_ID, A.ORG_NAME, A.FULL_NAME, B.PARENT_ORG_ID FROM TB_ORG A, TB_ORG_REL B WHERE A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID AND A.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID in ( select A.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID FROM TB_ORG_REL_TYPE A, TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF B, TB_ORG_TREE C WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = B.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND C.ORG_TREE_ID = B.ORG_TREE_ID AND C.ORG_ID = #{orgRootId})) AA START WITH ORG_ID = #{orgleafId} CONNECT BY PRIOR AA.SUP_ORG_ID = AA.ORG_ID ) ), ROOTTREE AS ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ORG_NAME, '->'), '->', '//'),'//', '/') fullName, ORG_NAME ORGNAME,ORG_ID ORGID,CREATE_DATE ORGRELCREATDATE,ORG_CODE ORGCODE,PARENT_ORG_ID supOrgId FROM (SELECT A.ORG_ID, A.ORG_NAME, A.FULL_NAME, B.PARENT_ORG_ID,to_char(B.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE,A.ORG_CODE FROM TB_ORG A, TB_ORG_REL B WHERE A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID AND A.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.STATUS_CD = 1000) AA START WITH ORG_ID = #{orgRootId} CONNECT BY PRIOR AA.ORG_ID = AA.PARENT_ORG_ID)) SELECT ROOTTREE.* FROM ROOTTREE,FUZZYORGTREE WHERE ROOTTREE.SUPORGID = FUZZYORGTREE.SUPORGID )

SELECT D.ORG_REL_ID orgRelId,D.ORG_ID orgId,D.PARENT_ORG_ID parentOrgId,D.REF_CODE refCode, D.STATUS_CD statusCd ,D.CREATE_DATE createDate,D.CREATE_USER createUser, D.UPDATE_DATE updateDate,D.UPDATE_USER updateUser,D.STATUS_DATE statusDate FROM TB_ORG_TREE A, TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF B, TB_ORG_REL_TYPE C, TB_ORG_REL D WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND D.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ORG_TREE_ID = B.ORG_TREE_ID AND B.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND D.REF_CODE = C.REF_CODE AND A.ORG_TREE_ID = #{orgTreeId} AND D.ORG_ID = #{orgId}

choose.when: SELECT B.ORG_NAME NAME, B.ORG_ID ID ,A.PARENT_ORG_ID PID,F.ORG_LEVEL "level" FROM TB_ORG_REL A, TB_ORG B, TB_ORG_REL_TYPE C, TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF D, TB_ORG_TREE E, TB_ORG_LEVEL F WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND D.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND F.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = D.ORG_TREE_ID AND C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = D.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND A.REF_CODE = C.REF_CODE AND A.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = F.ORG_TREE_ID AND F.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = #{orgTreeId} AND A.PARENT_ORG_ID = #{curOrgId} AND F.ORG_LEVEL <= #{lv} ORDER BY B.ORG_LEVEL
choose.otherwise: SELECT B.ORG_NAME NAME, B.ORG_ID ID ,A.PARENT_ORG_ID PID,F.ORG_LEVEL "level" FROM TB_ORG_REL A, TB_ORG B, TB_ORG_REL_TYPE C, TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF D, TB_ORG_TREE E, TB_ORG_LEVEL F WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND D.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND F.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = D.ORG_TREE_ID AND C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = D.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND A.REF_CODE = C.REF_CODE AND A.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = F.ORG_TREE_ID AND F.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = #{orgTreeId} AND A.ORG_ID = #{orgRootId}

mapper.select: SELECT NAME,ID,PID,CHKDISABLED,CASE WHEN lv=#{lv} then 0 else DECODE(NUM,0,0,1) end ISPARENT FROM ( SELECT B.ORG_NAME NAME, B.ORG_ID ID ,A.PARENT_ORG_ID PID, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_ORG_REL B WHERE B.STATUS_CD='1000' AND A.REF_CODE=C.REF_CODE AND B.PARENT_ORG_ID=A.ORG_ID) NUM, F.ORG_LEVEL lv FROM TB_ORG_REL A, TB_ORG B, TB_ORG_REL_TYPE C, TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF D, TB_ORG_TREE E, TB_ORG_LEVEL F WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND D.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND F.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = D.ORG_TREE_ID AND C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID = D.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND A.REF_CODE = C.REF_CODE AND A.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND F.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = F.ORG_TREE_ID AND E.ORG_TREE_ID = #{orgTreeId} AND F.ORG_LEVEL <= #{lv} )
